section.title: Manipulating
section.para: Open the file /exercises/index.html in your browser. Use the file /exercises/js/sandbox.js or work in Firebug to accomplish the following:

listitem.para: Add five new list items to the end of the unordered list #myList. Hint:
Add another h2 and another paragraph to the last div.module
Add another option to the select element; give the option the value "Wednesday"
Add a new div.module to the page after the last one; put a copy of one of the existing images inside of it.
